`r emsg <- "<!––Please use \x60pal::build_readme()\x60 or assign \x60pkg_metadata <- desc::desc_get(desc::desc_fields())\x60 in the \x60envir\x60 fed to \x60devtools::build_readme(...)\x60 to allow access to package metadata!––>"`To
install the latest development version of `r if (exists("pkg_metadata")) pkg_metadata[["Package"]] else emsg`, run the following in R:

``` {.r}
if (!("remotes" %in% rownames(installed.packages()))) {
  install.packages(pkgs = "remotes",
                   repos = "https://cloud.r-project.org/")
}

remotes::install_gitlab(repo = "`r stringr::str_remove(string = {if (exists("pkg_metadata")) pkg_metadata[["URL"]][1] else emsg}, pattern = "^https?://.+?\\..+?/")`")
```
